sentences.en: "He went back to the lab", Iris exclaimed impatiently.
sentences.cn: “他回实验室去了，”艾里斯不耐烦地大声说。

sentences.en: Air leaving the lab is filtered.
sentences.cn: 离开实验室的空气要过滤.

sentences.en: He indicated a space on one of the lab benches.
sentences.cn: 他指的是一张实验台上的空间.

sentences.en: I ground them in the lab, and extracted from the pulp a thick brown liquid.
sentences.cn: 我在实验室中将它们磨成浆, 从浆中提炼出一种棕色浓汁.

sentences.en: I'd like to do some checks on the procedures - standard lab checks, that is.
sentences.cn: 我想对实验过程做些考核,也就是标准的实验考核.

sentences.en: It is important to take stringent precautions against contamination in the lab.
sentences.cn: 必须特别注意实验室的污染.

sentences.en: It was reassembled in the physics lab.
sentences.cn: 这是在物理实验室里重新装配的.

sentences.en: Lab work is dull and repetitious.
sentences.cn: 实验室里的工作味同嚼蜡翻来复去.

sentences.en: Our chemistry teacher often reduces a compound to its components in lab.
sentences.cn: 在实验室中化学老师常把化合物分解为各种成分.

sentences.en: The lab assistant injected the rat with the new drug.
sentences.cn: 实验室助手给老鼠注射了那种新药.

sentences.en: The lab has recently been updated to allow for more advanced courses.
sentences.cn: 实验室最近经过更新，可以上更高阶的课程了。

sentences.en: The new chemistry lab was paid for by friends of the college.
sentences.cn: 新的化学实验室是由学院的资助者出钱建的.

sentences.en: We have classes in a computer lab.
We usually have Science in the science lab.
sentences.cn: 我们通常在科学实验室里上科学课。

sentences.en: You could call for independent testing lab reports.
sentences.cn: 你可以索要独立的测试实验室提出的测试报告.

phrases.tran_cn: 实验室助理；实验员；实验助手
实验室技术员；实验技师
媒体实验室；（美国麻省理工学院）媒体实验室

trans.tran_cn: 实验室，研究室，Lab,英国政治工党，分析室，暗室
